mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Virginia Printing Services photograph file and index 1965-1973
Skinner file and index
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The collection consists of photographs and negatives from the non-portrait file of Dave Skinner, the photographer for the University of Virginia Graphic Communications Services. [original]
The photographs and negatives are in sequence by their file numbers, not the original job order numbers stamped on them. [original]
A card index to the collection is available [original]
A listing of scenes containing women is available [original]
